sentences.en: A major change of political climate is not in prospect.
sentences.cn: 暂时还看不出政治面貌有可能发生巨变。

sentences.en: an exciting prospect
sentences.cn: 令人兴奋的前景

sentences.en: good job/employment/career prospects
sentences.cn: 美好的工作 / 就业 / 事业前途

sentences.en: He had prospected for minerals everywhere from the Gobi Desert to the Transvaal.
sentences.cn: 他在世界各地探过矿，从戈壁沙漠到德兰士瓦。

sentences.en: He was underwhelmed by the prospect of meeting the Queen.
sentences.cn: 即将见到女王并没让他兴奋不已。

sentences.en: He was undismayed by the prospect of failure.
sentences.cn: 想到可能会失败，他并不气馁。

sentences.en: I had no job, no education, and no prospects .
sentences.cn: 我没有工作，没受过什么教育，前途渺茫。

sentences.en: Jacqueline is not relishing the prospect of another spell in prison.
sentences.cn: 杰奎琳可不想再蹲一阵子监狱。

sentences.en: Redundancy can be a demoralising prospect.
sentences.cn: 面临裁员可能会令士气低落。

sentences.en: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity .
sentences.cn: 她心情平静地接受了动手术的可能性。

sentences.en: She was alarmed at the prospect of travelling alone.
sentences.cn: 她一想到独自旅行的情景就害怕。

sentences.en: She was really quite perturbed at the prospect.
sentences.cn: 她对前景十分担心。

sentences.en: Spending the holidays in Britain wasn't a prospect that I found particularly appealing.
sentences.cn: 在英国度假对我并不特别有吸引力。

sentences.en: The move to Prague was a daunting prospect for the bishop.
sentences.cn: 对于主教来说，要迁往布拉格有点儿令人发憷。

sentences.en: The prospect of civil war is very real.
sentences.cn: 发生内战的可能性是真实存在的。

sentences.en: The prospect of easy profits has attracted the wrong kind of businessman.
sentences.cn: 轻松捞取利润的可能性吸引了一拨不良商人。

sentences.en: The prospect of failure scares me rigid.
sentences.cn: 一想到失败我就吓得身体发僵。

sentences.en: The prospect of marriage terrified Alice.
sentences.cn: 想到要结婚，艾丽斯害怕极了。

sentences.en: The prospect of waiting around just twiddling his thumbs was appalling.
sentences.cn: 想到将要无所事事，他就非常害怕。

sentences.en: There is every prospect (= a strong possibility ) of the weather remaining dry this week.
sentences.cn: 本周天气很有可能持续干燥。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, there is little prospect of seeing these big questions answered.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，几乎不可能看到这些重大问题得到回复。

phrases.tran_cn: 光明的前景，辉煌的前程
展望；在期望中；可以预料到
期待，有希望；可以预料到

trans.tran_en: to examine an area of land or water, in order to find gold, silver, oil etc

trans.tran_cn: 勘探，勘察，（矿等）有希望，有前途

trans.tran_en: to examine an area of land or water, in order to find gold, silver, oil etc
